events.message: The candidate submitted an application for the software engineer position, highlighting extensive experience with cloud technologies and backend development.
Recruitment team classified the application under the Engineering cluster after reviewing the candidate's focus on software and development skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles was assigned to handle this candidate and coordinate further screening processes.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call, confirming the candidate's technical background aligns well with the job requirements.
The candidate responded enthusiastically, expressing a strong interest in moving forward with the interview process and discussing technical topics.
The technical interview was scheduled for the upcoming week, involving senior developers and focusing on coding and system design challenges.
